articles.title: Air India crash investigation: Cockpit audio deepens mystery of Flight 171 accident - BBC
articles.description: Fuel cut-off switches flipped seconds after takeoff in Air India crash, preliminary report finds.
articles.content:
Air India plane descending moments before crash
Investigators have uncovered a chilling discovery in the preliminary investigation into the Air India Flight 171 crash which killed 260 people in June… [+8839 chars]
